short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn selected text into a note on 1s.is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Note Now" is a powerful Chrome extension designed for users who want to capture their thoughts and important information swiftly. This user-friendly tool enables you to select any text from a webpage and save it as a note on 1s.is with just a few clicks.

When you highlight the desired text and right-click, you'll see an option labeled "Note Now." Upon selecting this option, your text will be automatically stored in the extension, and youâ€™ll be redirected to a new note page on 1s.is. Here, the selected text will conveniently populate a dedicated text area for easy editing and saving.

The "Note Now" extension is perfect for students, researchers, or anyone who frequently gathers information online. With its intuitive interface and seamless integration, you'll never miss capturing valuable insights again. Simplify your note-taking process and enhance your productivity with this essential tool!
